Sept. 24, 1995 D Buxton Entertainment Contest
Buxton Entertainment Contest 0 Entertainments Contest
buxton-entertainment-contest
None
Octagon Theatre, Pavilion Gardens, Buxton Best section 3 band - Derwent. Best section 4 band - Greenfield. Best soloist - Gillian Berry (cornet) Bollington. Best kit player - Neil Kerr (Skelmanthorpe). 10 bands competed.
March 23, 2015, 2:42 p.m. March 23, 2015, 2:45 p.m.
